thread.title: Shelley Pringle
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Shelley Pringle

author: Shelley Pringle
title: Shelley Pringle
text: I ordered a mat and frame to frame my husband's Scottish family crest (a very odd size) for him for Valentine's day. I couldn't believe that I received my order in 2 days and when I put my artwork in it, it is just beautiful. We bought my daughter the same print so I will definitely be ordering again. Thank you very much. Your tips on measuring were spot on.
